title: Zack Snyder unveils extended teaser for his Netflix sci-fi saga Rebel Moon
description: "Let's show them that we're more than the shackles that bind us."

title: Police are investigating an Indian actor for joking about the country’s Moon lander
description: There is a lot of national fervor surrounding Chandrayaan 3.

title: Amid US’s shameful maternal death rate, survey finds widespread mistreatment
description: One in five report mistreatment and 30% report discrimination.

title: In the (convection) zone: Astronomers eavesdrop on stars’ innate “twinkle”
description: "Convection within stars is similar to the process that fuels thunderstorms."

title: Atari launches replica 2600 console to go with all its replica 2600 cartridges
description: Software emulation keeps costs down, but may turn off retro-gaming enthusiasts.

title: Montana’s best defense of TikTok ban is deeply flawed, experts say
description: Plus: US-TikTok deal could give feds "near-unfettered" access to US user data.

title: T-Mobile unveils $100 phone plan, topping AT&T and Verizon’s highest prices
description: T-Mobile isn't trying to beat AT&T and Verizon on price anymore.

title: Dealmaster: Labor Day sales, Star Wars merchandise, Apple gear, and more
description: You can add to your Star Wars collection with some of these deals.

title: Meta’s “massively multilingual” AI model translates up to 100 languages, speech or text
description: Meta aims for a universal translator like "Babel Fish" from Hitchhiker’s Guide.

title: Nvidia announces a community-made RTX remaster of Half-Life 2
description: PBR materials, full ray-tracing, and DLSS are coming to Half-Life 2.

title: Netflix will let you keep your rental DVDs forever after September 29
description: Netflix offers amnesty for unreturned DVDs—and a chance to get 10 more free.

title: 3D printers printing without consent is a cautionary tale on cloud reliance
description: Bambu Lab says it will help with repairs, replacement parts.

title: Passenger seat belt warnings should be mandatory, say feds
description: The rule would apply to cars, trucks, and smaller buses.

title: Excel gets containerized, cloud-based Python analytics and visualization powers
description: Visualization and analytics tools available in preview, but may be paywalled.

title: Google says its Android runtime makes apps faster, even without an OS update
description: ART, the Android runtime, can bring Android 14 improvements to older devices.

title: Do Intel’s new graphics drivers actually overclock its low-end GPUs?
description: Higher reported clock speed for Arc A380 doesn't actually increase performance.

title: New offer gives Ubisoft, not Microsoft, control of Activision game-streaming rights
description: UK still needs to approve the new deal, which could extend far beyond Ubisoft+.

title: Crypto botnet on X is powered by ChatGPT
description: AI can be very easily harnessed to produce and disseminate misinformation.

title: Konami warns players of “outdated” content in Metal Gear Solid collection
description: Games will be presented "without alteration" to match "creator's original vision."

title: After Russia’s failure, India is next in line to attempt a Moon landing
description: No country besides China has successfully landed on the Moon since 1976.
